sentences.en: All rose and stood in silent tribute.
Almost any exhibition of complete self - sufficiency draws a stunned tribute from me.
sentences.cn: 这种几乎是完全我行我素的神情总是使我感到目瞪口呆,满心赞佩.

sentences.en: As the nation continued to mourn, the new President of South Africa paid his own tribute.
sentences.cn: 举国仍在哀悼之际，南非新任总统也表达了自己的怀念之情。

sentences.en: At her funeral her oldest friend paid tribute to her life and work.
sentences.cn: 在葬礼上，她最早的朋友对她的一生和工作给予了高度的赞扬。

sentences.en: Babbitt let Dr. Drew know that he was responsible for this tribute.
sentences.cn: 巴比特让特鲁博士知道这篇颂词是他促成的.

sentences.en: He paid tribute to the organising committee.
Her laughter and fragrance and willful glances were his tribute.
sentences.cn: 她的欢笑、温馨和秋波也是献给他的.

sentences.en: His success has been a tribute to hard work, to professionalism.
sentences.cn: 他的成功充分体现了他的勤劳苦干和敬业精神。

sentences.en: I’d like to pay tribute to (= praise and admire publicly ) the party workers for all their hard work.
sentences.cn: 我谨向党内工作人员致敬，感谢他们的辛苦努力。

sentences.en: I've got scars from head to toe in tribute to my courage.
sentences.cn: 为了嘉奖我的胆量,我得到浑身的伤疤.
她慈祥地接受了他们的致意.

sentences.en: She digressed from her prepared speech to pay tribute to the President.
sentences.cn: 她脱离了发言稿的主题，对总统给予了高度赞扬。

sentences.en: The award was a fitting tribute to her years of devoted work.
sentences.cn: 这个奖项是对她多年全心全意工作的恰如其分的褒奖。

sentences.en: The landscape offers a flaming tribute to the end of summer.
sentences.cn: 大地向夏末奉献火红的礼品.

sentences.en: The players wore black armbands as a tribute to their late teammate.
sentences.cn: 球员们戴着黑纱悼念已故的队友。

sentences.en: The song is a tribute to Roy Orbison.
sentences.cn: 那首歌是对罗伊·奥比森的致敬。

sentences.en: This book is a fitting tribute to the bravery of the pioneers.
sentences.cn: 本书是对先驱们大无畏精神恰如其分的献礼。

sentences.en: To their deliverer the poets paid the greatest tribute they could render.
sentences.cn: 诗人们竭尽全力地赞颂自己的拯救者.

trans.tran_en: something that you say, do, or give in order to express your respect or admiration for someone
